revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX7300 |revision=v1
(Nighthawk X4) |series=AC2200 |asin=B01D6JEMWS |newegg=N82E16833122842 |price=170 |fcc_date=04/08/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=range extender, mesh node, |fcc_id=PY315200317 |ic_id=4054A-15200317 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB25I |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEAR_2GEXT,NETGEAR_5GEXT |default_ip=192.168.1.250 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=A0:04:60 |oui_eth=A0:04:60 }} {{TagLine|AC2200 Nighthawk X4 WiFi Mesh Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX7300.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX7300}} *Web GUI: www.mywifiext.net WI2 is not identifiable in the FCC photos but is assumed :to be a [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 or a QCA9990. The [[Netgear EX6400]] appears to be internally identical to this device. :An [https://fccid.io/PY315200317/Letter/Cover-Letter-Description-of-Change-3450926 FCC C2PC Request] available on 8/18/2017 adds DFS support via software enabling. :[https://kb.netgear.com/000038545/EX6400-EX7300-Firmware-Version-1-0-1-60 EX6400 / EX7300 Firmware Version 1.0.1.60] "Supports CE DFS Band 2 and Band 3."
